prompts: Create a spiky sea creature Pokemon that can electrify its opponents.
I want a unique Pokemon that thrives in both ocean depths and rocky shores.
Generate a small aquatic Pokemon with vibrant colors and a playful demeanor.
Make a Pokemon with a round body and sharp spikes, perfect for underwater battles.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses electricity to defend itself from predators.
Design a Pokemon that has a mix of yellow and purple, showcasing its electric power.
Show me a Pokemon that can blend into aquatic environments with its colors and shape.
